31#ifndef _BL_H
32#define _BL_H
33
34#include <stdbool.h>
35#include <stdarg.h>
36#include <sys/param.h>
37#include <sys/socket.h>
38#include "blacklist.h"
39
40typedef enum {
41 BL_INVALID,
42 BL_ADD,
43 BL_DELETE
44} bl_type_t;
45
46typedef struct {
47 bl_type_t bi_type;
48 int bi_fd;
49 uid_t bi_uid;
50 gid_t bi_gid;
51 socklen_t bi_slen;
52 struct sockaddr_storage bi_ss;
53 char bi_msg[1024];
54} bl_info_t;
55
56#define bi_cred bi_u._bi_cred
57
58#ifndef _PATH_BLSOCK
59#define _PATH_BLSOCK "/var/run/blacklistd.sock"
60#endif
61
62__BEGIN_DECLS
63
64typedef struct blacklist *bl_t;
65
66bl_t bl_create(bool, const char *, void (*)(int, const char *, va_list));
67void bl_destroy(bl_t);
68int bl_send(bl_t, bl_type_t, int, const struct sockaddr *, socklen_t,
69 const char *);
70int bl_getfd(bl_t);
71bl_info_t *bl_recv(bl_t);
72bool bl_isconnected(bl_t);
73
74__END_DECLS
75
76#endif /* _BL_H */
77
